Watch living room TV (just stand close to TV)
Play piano in lego room (just stand there for 20s)
Visit the green rocking chair in the living room (just stand for 20s)
Wash your hands in upstairs bathroom (just stand there for 20s)
Wash your hands in downstairs bathroom (just stand there for 20s)
Wash dishes at the sink (just stand there for 20s)
Inspect dining room light (just stand there for 20s)
Get the mail from the mailbox, take it to kitchen (just do the walk)
Smell the flowers at back patio (just stand there for 20s)
Charge the robot in lego room (just stand there for 20s)
Ring doorbell on front porch (just stand there for 20s)
Grill a steak on deck (just stand there for 20s)
Water the tomatoes on back patio (just stand there for 20s)
Bake a cake in kitchen (just stand at oven for 20s)
Dry your hands (just stand there for 20s)
Grab a soda in garage (just stand there for 20s)
Bake a cake in kitchen (just stand at oven for 20s)
Sit on the toilet - VISIBLE
